>"I dont fool I remember that I'm 
> once MEgatron too, if the matrix
> is=
 weped out WE also are wiped...
> what is the warantee that that won't
> ha=
ppen?"said Hydras by privated link

Cyclonus paused thoughtfully, as if for=
 a moment in a burst of 
clarity, he realized that his own future depended =
on the same matrix 
he was so intent on gaining, but then his loyalty to Un=
icron snapped 
fully and forcefully into place.

"I have never said you wer=
e fooled easily Hydras, I call you not with 
lies but with truth." 

Cyclon=
us' voice was was both commanding and pleading as he 
spoke, "Hydras, part =
of you was once a servant of Unicron, you can be 
that again. You could obt=
ain power that spans the universe, a name 
for yourself greater than any Cy=
brtronian Autobot or Decepticon! The 
future is yours to make, here and now=
! Join us!"

Around him sweeps manuvered, their movements agitated and aggr=
essive 
as if they too knew of the tense offer delivered to the Predicon 
c=
ommander.

Decibel floated nearby Cyclonus uncharacteristically silent, onl=
y a 
low chuckle coming from her vocators.



Grimlock, Lord Elder, and Leg=
acy fired at the incoming sweeps, their 
firepower combined with that of th=
e shuttle and Ark is great indeed! 
Explosions dotted the skies as many swe=
eps attempted to dodge the 
fire and are unsuccessful.

However the sweeps =
were becoming more cagey as the fight continued, 
as if they were learning =
from the deaths of the previous ones, 
becoming more skilled, even seeming =
to anticipate attacks! 

Even Scorponok and Zarak are feeling these repercu=
ssions. Their 
attack from the rear bit a large sized hole in the minion fo=
rmation 
as the fusion cannon, rockets and machine guns rip into the mass. =
Yet 
for the G2 Decepticons it was like shaking a bee-hive. At the first 
t=
hey had not been attacked as the Sweeps had been ignoring 
Decepticons and =
Predicons, but that changed with this attack! As more 
sweeps maneuvered th=
rough the air to fill in the hole opened by 
Scorponok and Zarak, disintegr=
ation cannons opened fire on them, the 
air filling with a slight burning s=
mell!


 
Jhiaxus and Myrmidon headed into the mass of the sweeps, and the =

sweeps enfolded them, twisting and turning. The jets were more agile 
then=
 the sweeps, but the sweeps seemed to be well armored, and 
possesed a rath=
er large numerical advantage. 

Shots are fired on both sides, Jhiaxus and =
Myrmidon both taking down 
several sweeps at a time, but these seem to be r=
eplaced by a 
seemingly endless number of them. 
 


As Dark Rodimus arrive=
d it was becoming obvious to the casual 
observer that even though many of =
the sweeps had been destroyed, 
there were still many of them in the skies.=
 The smell of burnt metal 
and alloy was begining to fill the air, as smoke=
 covered the ground 
obscuring vision of many. 

However even through all t=
hat the aerial form of Cyclonus stood out, 
resplendent and majestic, like =
an emperor looking over the land he 
will soon conquer! 

As Dark Rodimus' =
firepower reaches into the skies, Cyclonus turned 
toward it as if at the l=
ast moment detecting it, but it is too late! 
Power ripped through his syst=
ems as circuits are temporarily 
overloaded and his once pristine armor is =
singed, scorched and 
pitted! 

Inwardly Cyclonus smiled as he knew who it =
was that did this: Rodimus 
had arrived!

Flipping through the skies by the=
 power of the blast it took a moment 
for Cyclonus to regain his bearing in=
 the air. As he leveled out, 
already sweeps were rallying to his aid, brin=
ging their cannons to 
bear on Rodimus and opening up on him!

"NO!" Cyclon=
us called to them, his voice radiating power and 
authority.  "He is mine!"=
  he commanded as he launched twin 
incendiary missiles at Rodimus, ones th=
at glowed like miniature twin 
suns, as they seemed to almost glide foward =
toward Rodimus!



"It is time!" barked Scourge across the minion communica=
tion network, 
even as he watched his commander and friend get pulled into =
the fray. 
His gruff voice crackled in the ears of Nightstrike, Darkfate an=
d 
Tummult. 

With a single command sweeps pulled out and away, launching f=
rom the 
center of the group. They did not target Rodimus or the Decepticon=
s! 
Instead nearly a third of the remaining sweep moved at their primary 
t=
arget, led by Scourge, and Tummult (and Darkfate and Nightstrike??), 
with =
cannons blazing they pushed towards the ARK!

Preston
